
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a complex number-like object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether a value is a complex number-like object.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new {{alias:@stdlib/complex/float32}}( 2.0, 2.0 ) )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( new {{alias:@stdlib/complex/float64}}( 3.0, 1.0 ) )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( 3.14 )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    See Also
    --------
